name: iPhone Backup Passsword Recovery
short_description:
When backup iPhone with iTunes, you can set a password for encryption. If you lost or forgotten the password, you will not be able to restore iPhone to the backup. Don't worry. iPhone Backup Password Recovery can help you get rid of the program. It is a powerful password decryption tool designed to recover iPhone backup password through Brute-force attack, Brute-force with Mask attack and Dictionary attack. By using this program, you can easily recover lost or forgotten iTunes backup password of your iPhone, iPad and iPod touch. It fully supports all iOS devices, including iPhone 5S, 5C, 5, 4S, 4, 3GS, iPad Air, iPad mini, the new iPad, iPod touch 5/4, etc.

iPhone Backup Password Recovery Professional, the higher version of iPhone Backup Password Recovery Standard, makes uses of GPU acceleration technique to improve the password recovery speed. You will enjoy much faster speed in recovering iPhone backup password if your computer is with NVIDIA video cards.
summary: Recover iTunes Backup Password for iPhone 6/6Plus/5S/5/4S
